      • toContinue

        public static void toContinue()

      • readNumber

        public static java.lang.Number readNumber​(java.lang.String message,
                                          java.lang.String type)
        Catch a number introduced by console.
        Parameters:
        message - (String) Message asking the user.
        type - (String) The numeric type ("byte", "short", "int", "long", "float", "double").
        Returns:
        The numeric value writed by the user. Return -1 in the case of error ocurred.

      • readLine

        public static java.lang.String readLine​(java.lang.String message)
        Ask and catch the characters introduced by console.
        Parameters:
        message - (String) Message asking the user.
        Returns:
        The string writed by the user.

      • readCharacter

        public static char readCharacter​(java.lang.String message)
        Catch a single character introduced by console.
        Parameters:
        message - Message asking the user.
        Returns:
        The first character writed by the user.

      • inRange

        public static boolean inRange​(int value,
                              int min,
                              int max)
        Check if a integer number is in value.
        Parameters:
        value - (int) The value to be checked.
        min - (int) The lowest value of the range.
        max - (int) The highest value of the range.
        Returns:
        True or false depends if the value is between the min and max values.

      • showMenu

        public static void showMenu​(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String[] options)
        Show a menu in console.
        Parameters:
        title - (String) Menu title.
        options - (String[]) Array with the options of the menu.

        Parameters:
        title - (String) Box text.

      • makeSure

        public static boolean makeSure​(java.lang.String message)
        Ask the user for confirmation.
        Parameters:
        message - The confirmation question.
        Returns:
        • True - If the user type the character 'S'
        • False - If the user type the character 'N'

      • validateQuestion

        public static boolean validateQuestion​(char character)
        Validate a returned character match with the requested value.
        Parameters:
        character - The character write by the user.
        Returns:
        • True - If mached
        • False - If doesn't mached

      • validInt

        public static int validInt​(java.lang.String message)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • validString

        Request user for a String until enter valid String format base of its length.
        Parameters:
        message - (String) Message asking the user.
        maxLength - Max number of characters.
        Returns:

      • validEmail

        Parameters:

        Returns:
